scripts.deploy: npm run build:nft && cd nft && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:ft && npm run build:nft && npm run build:crowdfund && npm run build:fake-usdc-ft && npm run build:item-dao
scripts.build:crowdfund: cd crowdfund && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:nft: cd nft && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:ft: cd ft && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:fake-usdc-ft: cd fake-usdc-ft && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:item-dao: cd item-dao && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:nft && npm run build:ft && cd integration-tests && cargo run --example integration-tests "../crowdfund/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wehave_crowdfund.wasm" "../nft/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wehave_nft.wasm" "../fake-usdc-ft/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/fake_usdc_ft.wasm" "../item-dao/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wehave_item_dao.wasm"
